3. Single-cell RNA-seq data preprocessing¶

Network analysis and simulation in celloracle require processed scRNA-seq data. We recommend processing scRNA-seq data using either scanpy or Seurat. If you want to know general idea of scRNA-seq data processing, please go to the documentation of scanpy and the documentation of Seurat . This step needs to include data quality check, filtering, normalization, dimensional reduction, clustering and cluster annotation. If you have preprocessed scRNA-seq data, such as anndata or seurat object, you can skip this part.

Note

several tips

A. scRNA-seq data preprocessing with scanpy¶

scanpy is a python library for the analysis of scRNA-seq data.

In this tutorial, we use the almost same code as one of scanpy tutorials with some modification.
